name: id
description: The relevant ID of the table.

name: time_period
description: The time period for which the metrics apply.

name: name
description: The name of the entity.

name: country
description: Country where entity is located (The country's name as displayed on it's Wikipedia page). Set to null if not relevant.

name: country_code
description: The entity country's ISO 3166 three letter alpha3 code. Set to null if not relevant.

name: country_code_2
description: The entity country's ISO 3166 two letter alpha2 code. Set to null if not relevant.

name: region
description: The entity country's United Nations Statistics Division M49 subregion name. Set to null if not relevant.

name: subregion
description: The entity country's United Nations Statistics Division M49 region name. Set to null if not relevant.

name: coordinates
description: The entity's location by latitude and longitude. Set to null if not relevant.

name: total_outputs
description: The total number of outputs in the given time period.

name: oa_coki
description: Custom fields created by COKI to determine COKI OA categories.

fields.name: open
fields.description: Work is designated as open access by Unpaywall.

fields.name: total
fields.description: The total number of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: The percentage of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: closed
fields.description: Work is not designated as open access by Unpaywall.

fields.name: total
fields.description: The total number of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: The percentage of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: publisher
fields.description: Work is designated as Publisher Open. An article published in an Open Access Journal or made accessible in a Subscription Journal. Where the Unpaywall journal_is_in_doaj field is True or where the Unpaywall best_oa_location location_type field is “publisher”

fields.name: total
fields.description: The total number of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: The percentage of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: other_platform
fields.description: Work is designated as Other Platform Open. The publication was shared online; on a preprint server, a university library repository, domain repository or an academic staff page. Any article where any oa_location element in the Unpaywall data has the location_type “repository”

fields.name: total
fields.description: The total number of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: The percentage of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: publisher_only
fields.description: Work is designated as only Publisher Open (and not Other Platform Open or Closed).

fields.name: total
fields.description: The total number of outputs for this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: The percentage of outputs for this OA type.

name: citations
description: Breakdown of citation information from various sources.

fields.name: openalex
fields.description: OpenAlex data is sourced from https://openalex.org/.

fields.name: total_citations
fields.description: The total number of citatations.

fields.name: citations_per_output
fields.description: Total number of citations divided by number of outputs.

fields.name: outputs_with_citations
fields.description: Number of outputs that have at least one citation.

fields.name: outputs_without_citations
fields.description: Number of outputs that have no citations.

fields.name: citations_per_cited_output
fields.description: Total number of citations divided by number of outputs that have at least one citation.

fields.name: crossref
fields.description: Crossref data is sourced from https://www.crossref.org/.

fields.name: total_citations
fields.description: The total number of citatations.

fields.name: citations_per_output
fields.description: Total number of citations divided by number of outputs.

fields.name: outputs_with_citations
fields.description: Number of outputs that have at least one citation.

fields.name: outputs_without_citations
fields.description: Number of outputs that have no citations.

fields.name: citations_per_cited_output
fields.description: Total number of citations divided by number of outputs that have at least one citation.

fields.name: open_citations
fields.description: Open Citations data is sourced from https://opencitations.net/.

fields.name: total_citations
fields.description: The total number of citatations.

fields.name: citations_per_output
fields.description: Total number of citations divided by number of outputs.

fields.name: outputs_with_citations
fields.description: Number of outputs that have at least one citation.

fields.name: outputs_without_citations
fields.description: Number of outputs that have no citations.

fields.name: citations_per_cited_output
fields.description: Total number of citations divided by number of outputs that have at least one citation.

fields.name: mag
fields.description: Microsoft Academic Graph data is sourced from https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/project/microsoft-academic-graph/.

fields.name: total_citations
fields.description: The total number of citatations.

fields.name: citations_per_output
fields.description: Total number of citations divided by number of outputs.

fields.name: outputs_with_citations
fields.description: Number of outputs that have at least one citation.

fields.name: outputs_without_citations
fields.description: Number of outputs that have no citations.

fields.name: citations_per_cited_output
fields.description: Total number of citations divided by number of outputs that have at least one citation.

name: output_types
description: Data broken down by crossref output type.

fields.name: output_type
fields.description: Crossref output type. One of the type ids from https://api.crossref.org/v1/types (eg journal_articles, book_sections etc).

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs of this type.

fields.name: num_oa_outputs
fields.description: Total number of OA outputs of this type.

fields.name: num_green_outputs
fields.description: Total number of green OA outputs of this type.

fields.name: num_gold_outputs
fields.description: Total number of gold OA outputs of this type.

fields.name: num_gold_just_doaj_outputs
fields.description: Total number of gold in doaj outputs of this type.

fields.name: num_hybrid_outputs
fields.description: total number of hybrid OA outputs of this type.

fields.name: num_bronze_outputs
fields.description: total number of hybrid OA outputs of this type.

fields.name: num_green_only_outputs
fields.description: total number of green only outputs of this type.

fields.name: total_openalex_citations
fields.description: Total number of citations from Open Alex.

fields.name: total_open_citations_citations
fields.description: Total number of citations from Open Citations.

fields.name: total_crossref_citations
fields.description: Total number of citations from Crossref.

fields.name: total_mag_citations
fields.description: Total number of citations from MAG.

name: repositories
description: Breakdown of repositories (from coki.repositories).

fields.name: id
fields.description: Repository name generated by COKI

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs found on that repository.

fields.name: category
fields.description: Type of repository, generated by COKI.

fields.name: home_repo
fields.description: True if the repository is linked to a ROR id for the entity.

name: institutions
description: Institutional breakdown.

name: events

name: access_types
description: Data summarised and broken down by OA access type.

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: Percent of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: green
fields.description: Green Open Access is defined as any case where Unpaywall identifies a copy of an output in a repository. This includes preprint repositories (eg arxiv) both submitted, accepted and VoR versions of outputs. In a small number of cases preprint repositories register content as being journal articles (SSRN is the most common case). Green as defined here also explicitly includes those outputs that are also available via the publisher. For the set of content which is only freely available via a repository see "green_only".

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: Percent of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: gold
fields.description: Gold OA is defined as either the journal being in DOAJ or the best_oa_location being a publisher and a license being detected. This works because Unpaywall will set the publisher as the best oa location if it identifies an accessible publisher copy.

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: Percent of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: gold_doaj
fields.description: Gold Open Access in DOAJ Journal is determined directly from the Unpaywall statement that the journal is in DOAJ. No further checking is done on this, so articles that Unpaywall does not capture as being accessible that are in DOAJ journals will be characterised as gold_just_doaj.

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: Percent of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: hybrid
fields.description: Hybrid Open Access is defined as being available at a publisher with a discovered license, where the journal of publication is not in DOAJ. This means that some publisher hybrid is not detected because Unpaywall does not detect a license. The use of DOAJ as defining a 'fully oa journal' is also narrow and future developments will expand this considering, among other parameters, the Unpaywall tag 'journal-is-oa'.

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: Percent of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: bronze
fields.description: Bronze Open Access is defined as being available at the publisher website but without a license being detected by Unpaywall. This is intended to capture cases where content is unilaterally made readable by the publisher (eg via a moving paywall) as in these cases a more open license is not generally applied. However, this is a heuristic and there are significant issues distinguishing between different modes by which publishers make content readable.

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: Percent of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: green_only
fields.description: Green Open Access where the outputs is not available Gold (DOAJ or Hybrid) or Bronze: green_only is the subset of outputs available from repositories that are not also available free to read from the publisher. This category enables analyses of gold, bronze and green as mutually exclusive categories, e.g. in the generation of stacked bar charts that include gold_doaj, green, hybrid and bronze. This corresponds to general usage of the term 'green' in some other literature.

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: Percent of outputs associated with this OA type.

fields.name: breakdown
fields.description: Breakdown of OA status.

fields.name: label
fields.description: OA type label.

fields.name: access_type
fields.description: OA type.

fields.name: status
fields.description: TRUE / FALSE value for whether it is talking about the OA or not OA count for the oa sub-category.

fields.name: total_outputs
fields.description: Total number of outputs of this type.

fields.name: outputs_with_citations
fields.description: Total number of outputs with citations for this type.

fields.name: outputs_without_citations
fields.description: Total number of outputs without citations for this type.
